statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_data
SELECT patient_id, genetic_code FROM genetic_data
SELECT patient_id, treatment_options FROM genetic_data WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM genetic_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT patient_id, genetic_code FROM genetic_data WHERE genetic_code = 'ATGC'
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_code FROM genetic_data WHERE patient_id > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_options->'drug' AS drug_name FROM genetic_data WHERE genetic_code LIKE '%A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM genetic_data WHERE treatment_options->>'status' = 'active';
SELECT DISTINCT genetic_code FROM genetic_data WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(treatment_options->'medications') > 3 ORDER BY genetic_code ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientGeneticData
SELECT patient_name, genetic_variant FROM PatientGeneticData
SELECT treatment_description FROM TreatmentHistory
SELECT * FROM TreatmentHistory ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, genetic_test_date FROM GeneticTestResults ORDER BY genetic_test_date ASC
SELECT * FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE patient_id = '92f2a5f6-d3fe-4b33-835b-a0c498d67cb1';
SELECT patient_name, genetic_variant FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(treatment_date) AS latest_treatment_date FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE patient_id = 'b46e7e87-9d42-42df-b3c6-1eec5829379f';

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(test_id) AS num_tests FROM PatientGeneticData LEFT JOIN GeneticTestResults ON PatientGeneticData.patient_id = GeneticTestResults.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(test_id) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE treatment_options->>'surgery' = 'true';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, description FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, date_started FROM Patients JOIN Patient_Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Patient_Treatments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Patient_Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Patient_Treatments.patient_id WHERE age < 50;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, genetic_data FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, description FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, date_started FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Patient_Treatments pt ON p.patient_id = pt.patient_id ORDER BY date_started ASC;

SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name FROM Patients p JOIN Patient_Treatments pt ON p.patient_id = pt.patient_id JOIN Treatments t ON pt.treatment_id = t.treatment_id WHERE t.effectiveness = 'High';
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_code FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT option_name FROM treatment_options WHERE option_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, option_id, treatment_date FROM patient_treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, note, note_date FROM patient_data JOIN physician_notes ON patient_data.patient_id = physician_notes.patient_id WHERE patient_data.patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_code FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT option_name, option_description FROM treatment_options WHERE option_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT patient_name, treatment_date, option_name FROM patient_data JOIN patient_treatments ON patient_data.patient_id = patient_treatments.patient_id JOIN treatment_options ON patient_treatments.option_id = treatment_options.option_id;
SELECT patient_name, note, note_date FROM patient_data JOIN physician_notes ON patient_data.patient_id = physician_notes.patient_id WHERE physician_notes.note LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM Treatments WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE medication_type = 'Painkiller';
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
